column6: THE NEXT GENERATION OF ULTIMATES!!! - Hot bods & fun in the sun: What, you thought this was a new Marvel Swimsuit Special? It's just Black Widow, Kitty Pryde, Dagger & Bombshell getting in trouble, Coney Island style! - What villainess does Spider-Man fall in love with? - And what tragedy will change the life of Bombshell?
